wgsl-analyzer.customImports.markdownDescription: `#import` directives in the flavor of [Bevy Engine](https://bevyengine.org)'s [shader preprocessor](https://bevyengine.org/news/bevy-0-6/#shader-imports). To use objects from an import, add `#import <name>` to your WGSL.

wgsl-analyzer.diagnostics.nagaParsingErr.description: Controls whether to show naga's parsing errors.

wgsl-analyzer.diagnostics.nagaValidation.description: Controls whether to show naga's validation errors.

wgsl-analyzer.diagnostics.nagaVersion.description: Which version of naga to use for its diagnostics

wgsl-analyzer.diagnostics.typeErrors.description: Controls whether to show type errors.

wgsl-analyzer.inlayHints.parameterHints.description: Whether to show inlay hints for the names of function parameters

wgsl-analyzer.inlayHints.structLayoutHin.description: Whether to show inlay hints for the layout of struct fields

wgsl-analyzer.inlayHints.typeHints.description: Whether to show inlay hints for types of variable declarations

wgsl-analyzer.preprocessor.shaderDefs.markdownDescription: Shader defines used in `#ifdef` directives in the flavor of [Bevy Engine](https://bevyengine.org)'s [shader preprocessor](https://bevyengine.org/news/bevy-0-6/#shader-imports).

wgsl-analyzer.trace.extension.description: Log debug info in the WGSL Analyzer output pane.

wgsl-analyzer.trace.server.description: Log messages between client and server in the WGSL Analyzer output pane.
